HTTPS (SSL)

# 

<span key="d317d68c3af043d7a5fea122697f666c"><span offset-key="d317d68c3af043d7a5fea122697f666c:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">â€‹</span></span></span>

<span key="4f586f5e9c774b69add398b9c2600629"><span offset-key="4f586f5e9c774b69add398b9c2600629:0">Netlify offers free HTTPS on all sites, including automatic certificate creation and renewal. Our certificates use the modern TLS protocol, which has replaced the now deprecated SSL standard.</span></span>

<span key="b7d533470b4644e29feb238a756ce0c1"><span offset-key="b7d533470b4644e29feb238a756ce0c1:0">HTTPS brings a lot of advantages:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="bc718e2dab254cfe9a9e4bbef702ca8b">**Content integrity:**<span offset-key="bc718e2dab254cfe9a9e4bbef702ca8b:1"> Without HTTPS, free Wi-Fi services can inject ads into your pages.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="44cc0b680db34b1e8a121f46b2f7e18d">**Security:**<span offset-key="44cc0b680db34b1e8a121f46b2f7e18d:1"> If your site has a login or accepts form submissions, HTTPS is essential for your usersâ€™ security and privacy.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="0d8d5eae4e0b453fb0b6d79409079ad7">**SEO:**<span offset-key="0d8d5eae4e0b453fb0b6d79409079ad7:1"> Google search results prioritize sites with HTTPS enabled.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="2c1213c3f2bf4883b639d38759830795">**Referral analytics:**<span offset-key="2c1213c3f2bf4883b639d38759830795:1"> HTTPS-enabled sites will not send referral data to sites without HTTPS enabled.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="1618700b0d954a969867760b84847813">**HTTP/2:**<span offset-key="1618700b0d954a969867760b84847813:1"> Boost your sitesâ€™ performance â€” </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#http-2" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0daeecba6b284fd18ad89804d9d983da" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="27c7a609dc1e4dc88f408084a730ea63"><span data-offset-key="27c7a609dc1e4dc88f408084a730ea63:0">HTTP/2</span></span></span></a><span key="1728c99591c84bee932ed0c6d37d3e62"><span offset-key="1728c99591c84bee932ed0c6d37d3e62:0"> requires HTTPS.</span></span>

## 

<span key="3dabce884b3c4b6f94ca8d12b642856e"><span offset-key="3dabce884b3c4b6f94ca8d12b642856e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#certificate-service-types" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b75f5de14ba8469f809c9b0adc7d8e80" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="bdd0e5895da84509a7b6754aa4a73e3f"><span data-offset-key="bdd0e5895da84509a7b6754aa4a73e3f:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="442435bc7a1d458dad187ecd09d4679f"><span offset-key="442435bc7a1d458dad187ecd09d4679f:0">Certificate service types</span></span>

<span key="02b9cd2aaa474a4e935e85cf314b8d56"><span offset-key="02b9cd2aaa474a4e935e85cf314b8d56:0">Netlify offers three different ways of providing a certificate for HTTPS.</span></span>

<span key="4d959144de9a45f69461ca1824c32e76">**Netlify-managed certificates**<span offset-key="4d959144de9a45f69461ca1824c32e76:1"> are offered to all Netlify sites for free. Find details for this in the section on </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#netlify-managed-certificates" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d84509e623134788b0c5da4f393a44bf" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="a7c5157529f94719bede3758c7e34cb9"><span data-offset-key="a7c5157529f94719bede3758c7e34cb9:0">Netlify-managed certificates</span></span></span></a><span key="5b0d66aa05094b798ee692783b0f89d0"><span offset-key="5b0d66aa05094b798ee692783b0f89d0:0">.</span></span>

<span key="a2720abdcdf04cc4941f659c13ae2b9f">**Custom certificates**<span offset-key="a2720abdcdf04cc4941f659c13ae2b9f:1"> are a way for you to provide a certificate that matches your specifications â€” things like a wildcard certificate or an Extended Validation (EV) certificate. If youâ€™d like to provide your own custom certificate, refer to </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#custom-certificates" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="fe6f1118fdcd45878e960f9a7af9ff12" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="6543aa6d5f964d0cbd39f86e9f019df6"><span data-offset-key="6543aa6d5f964d0cbd39f86e9f019df6:0">Custom certificates</span></span></span></a><span key="efe87dcacf3c40d1954dc51e4faab75c"><span offset-key="efe87dcacf3c40d1954dc51e4faab75c:0"> below for more details.</span></span>

<span key="467b23748dc74554ba5cf4822bba4a89">**Certificates with dedicated IPs**<span offset-key="467b23748dc74554ba5cf4822bba4a89:1"> are available for people who do not want to use </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#certificates-with-dedicated-ips" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="294fa0e9beda4a75943807b44dfe070e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="7174da53b00b439a9d2bb630004da8da"><span data-offset-key="7174da53b00b439a9d2bb630004da8da:0">SNI-based</span></span></span></a><span key="a2d809dce1a24c00bbdfc9f293186df3"><span offset-key="a2d809dce1a24c00bbdfc9f293186df3:0"> certificates. If you want your own unique certificate available to all browsers without requiring SNI and without a shared certificate as fallback, </span></span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/support" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="03dda9e88a5e43a59532c1696283f73a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="d640991c261445998e33784624e7e24e"><span data-offset-key="d640991c261445998e33784624e7e24e:0">please contact us</span></span></span></a><span key="1d3a980c66ea4f4ebec502053c83a536"><span offset-key="1d3a980c66ea4f4ebec502053c83a536:0">. </span>*(This feature may not be available on all* </span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/pricing/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2351ce4168d84ec6a2e0552871a70bf6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="aba6c6e52bbf4a5aa129f79712517bdb"><em>plans</em></span></span></a><span key="0558a2b923334964a1f92680ad78a80b">*.)*</span>

### 

<span key="fb6631b94bfe410eb084a75e1637a1d3"><span offset-key="fb6631b94bfe410eb084a75e1637a1d3:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#netlify-managed-certificates" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a6ec090872e5473093ccaa78cc8bf2e0" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="57447402390b465cadee2ff0f6dbe0d1"><span data-offset-key="57447402390b465cadee2ff0f6dbe0d1:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="810e25461c25410fb5e5ed374c85f9ca"><span offset-key="810e25461c25410fb5e5ed374c85f9ca:0">Netlify-managed certificates</span></span>

<span key="9a2fd0b8c14b4a74862a518fcbad5dfc"><span offset-key="9a2fd0b8c14b4a74862a518fcbad5dfc:0">When you create a new site on Netlify, itâ€™s instantly secured at the Netlify-generated URL (for example, </span>`https://brave-curie-67195.netlify.app`<span offset-key="9a2fd0b8c14b4a74862a518fcbad5dfc:2">). If you add a </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/custom-domains/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2a989a788ca64417994d7dd2836268fc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="2b302674ae97439faafe98342f84cd18"><span data-offset-key="2b302674ae97439faafe98342f84cd18:0">custom domain</span></span></span></a><span key="c2749614bc61466d9ff07cdab1905379"><span offset-key="c2749614bc61466d9ff07cdab1905379:0">, we will automatically provision a certificate with </span></span><a href="https://letsencrypt.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d4a62ea9ba044dfcafa051e9d5cf4c30" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="979d2a49d94748cb92ce746dc5d970f1"><span data-offset-key="979d2a49d94748cb92ce746dc5d970f1:0">Letâ€™s Encrypt</span></span></span></a><span key="a75038d5a9a740ce88a4138adccbd5e1"><span offset-key="a75038d5a9a740ce88a4138adccbd5e1:0">, enabling HTTPS on your domain. Certificates are generated and renewed automatically as needed.</span></span>

<span key="87d74584fca34eceb353c22b36a29799"><span offset-key="87d74584fca34eceb353c22b36a29799:0">Use Netlify DNS for automatic wildcards</span></span>

<span key="eeaf923f8ee04d9a9b474c5595c6c4c6"><span offset-key="eeaf923f8ee04d9a9b474c5595c6c4c6:0">If your domain uses </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/netlify-dns/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="42c02e70e58c45fbab2e350c1c0ceb11" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="0e1fd16e17ff4939a24ee7f18037a6a6"><span data-offset-key="0e1fd16e17ff4939a24ee7f18037a6a6:0">Netlify DNS</span></span></span></a><span key="2d272e490c2e4488a7244a84d9f43f43"><span offset-key="2d272e490c2e4488a7244a84d9f43f43:0">, weâ€™ll automatically provision a wildcard certificate, which ensures instant HTTPS for all of the Netlify sites using subdomains of that domain.</span></span>

<span key="ff992e050493443095af00019f05d9d2"><span offset-key="ff992e050493443095af00019f05d9d2:0">In rare circumstances, there can be problems when provisioning a certificate for some domains. You can check the status of your siteâ€™s certificates in </span>**Site settings &gt; Domain management &gt; HTTPS**<span offset-key="ff992e050493443095af00019f05d9d2:2">.</span></span>

<span key="7d71a21cf1f44265850cbb343f0d783e"><span offset-key="7d71a21cf1f44265850cbb343f0d783e:0">If youâ€™re having trouble with the automatic provisioning, visit the </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/troubleshooting-tips/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ed2fa05c011e4871844e900f56172175" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="fe95388a596b40f58585264006e1746d"><span data-offset-key="fe95388a596b40f58585264006e1746d:0">troubleshooting page</span></span></span></a><span key="d8a7b478c35d4b73bbfe0ec862b2ce21"><span offset-key="d8a7b478c35d4b73bbfe0ec862b2ce21:0"> for an error message guide and other tips.</span></span>

<span key="70ce4cc4e42e49fa8709d9d885c26ba2">**#Domain aliases**</span>

<span key="0a054837dfd34137a12561fcabd9b24d"><span offset-key="0a054837dfd34137a12561fcabd9b24d:0">Your certificate will include all your </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/custom-domains/multiple-domains/#domain-aliases" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="fc9b74cdc7e34705b410f4c7544d413d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="692f7cea31f14bdfa077976b2da16a61"><span data-offset-key="692f7cea31f14bdfa077976b2da16a61:0">domain aliases</span></span></span></a><span key="3ece001905cb4ec69ee748ab6603f8e8"><span offset-key="3ece001905cb4ec69ee748ab6603f8e8:0"> when itâ€™s issued, but note that DNS also needs to be configured </span>*in advance*<span offset-key="3ece001905cb4ec69ee748ab6603f8e8:2"> for all aliases for us to include them on your certificate. Visit the </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/troubleshooting-tips/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="96889e51e4344997857ab3eafb52f8bb" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="2b441da1a0834ca0a76570bd1b59e600"><span data-offset-key="2b441da1a0834ca0a76570bd1b59e600:0">troubleshooting page</span></span></span></a><span key="2d61be8eba8245a5b6f235dab2a7a3d4"><span offset-key="2d61be8eba8245a5b6f235dab2a7a3d4:0"> for more information on confirming the new configuration.</span></span>

<span key="8cc6997c8b694cf28ef4a410cefe8e28"><span offset-key="8cc6997c8b694cf28ef4a410cefe8e28:0">Avoid rate limiting for subdomains</span></span>

<span key="1ae8178c56dd45ecb16cabf122ffedac"><span offset-key="1ae8178c56dd45ecb16cabf122ffedac:0">If you have more than 5 aliases that are subdomains of the same domain, you might run into rate limits with our certificate provider. In that case we recommend you provide your own wildcard certificate using Netlify DNS or </span></span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/support" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4a8a5a34fb074eac99c1d1427c536df6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="4e12aa4a401943c6a705b155320de441"><span data-offset-key="4e12aa4a401943c6a705b155320de441:0">contact support</span></span></span></a><span key="7190aa104eb5428d8cd2bd470b9afe14"><span offset-key="7190aa104eb5428d8cd2bd470b9afe14:0"> for our assistance for getting them set up with our certificate provider. Please do this </span>*before adding any aliases*<span offset-key="7190aa104eb5428d8cd2bd470b9afe14:2"> for best results!</span></span>

### 

<span key="6752ac5b470e4c1aadffced5b303d2ca"><span offset-key="6752ac5b470e4c1aadffced5b303d2ca:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#custom-certificates" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6bc2bd44df9842ed90c0eba8b60eec5a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="68fa7a0d5cee4a8ba813b7e140997b19"><span data-offset-key="68fa7a0d5cee4a8ba813b7e140997b19:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="5c1b60e0ad9f4f2f87a430079508b6ed"><span offset-key="5c1b60e0ad9f4f2f87a430079508b6ed:0">Custom certificates</span></span>

<span key="53ec8ca918774f03bcc596a5fc5061e9"><span offset-key="53ec8ca918774f03bcc596a5fc5061e9:0">If you already have a certificate for your domain and prefer that to Netlifyâ€™s domain-validated certificate, you can install your own.</span></span>

<span key="70021f896e1c41be8435c715281a5496"><span offset-key="70021f896e1c41be8435c715281a5496:0">To install a certificate, youâ€™ll need:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="8c36e49073ed401cb27485b90dffbe5f"><span offset-key="8c36e49073ed401cb27485b90dffbe5f:0">the certificate itself, in X.509 PEM format (usually a .crt file)</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="c352bc98c0914d66ac63750792fa0fff"><span offset-key="c352bc98c0914d66ac63750792fa0fff:0">the private key you used to request the certificate</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="f81cda7219d04032ac6caa75b2a87844"><span offset-key="f81cda7219d04032ac6caa75b2a87844:0">a chain of intermediary certificates from your Certificate Authority (CA)</span></span>

<span key="413c5d05db594e07bc39d7821b3b16d8"><span offset-key="413c5d05db594e07bc39d7821b3b16d8:0">In </span>**Site settings &gt; Domain management &gt; HTTPS**<span offset-key="413c5d05db594e07bc39d7821b3b16d8:2">, select </span>**Set Custom Certificate**<span offset-key="413c5d05db594e07bc39d7821b3b16d8:4">, then enter the information above.</span></span>

<span key="8ee0d147bf0c4d3c9f827409474033fc"><span offset-key="8ee0d147bf0c4d3c9f827409474033fc:0">Renewal is not automatic</span></span>

<span key="9f5b00cf0bd647caa30f4b0753db771b"><span offset-key="9f5b00cf0bd647caa30f4b0753db771b:0">When the time comes to renew your custom certificate, Netlify cannot do this automatically. You will need to renew it at your Certificate Authority, then follow the steps above to install it on your Netlify site. For automatic renewal, you can switch to a </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#netlify-managed-certificates" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="575815b3a7e74b739cd3010fdf047e13" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="b8d3e03925ea41c8a72c248ff8f5d8f2"><span data-offset-key="b8d3e03925ea41c8a72c248ff8f5d8f2:0">Netlify-managed certificate</span></span></span></a><span key="01511c1f4f4047e8a5227657febc3b90"><span offset-key="01511c1f4f4047e8a5227657febc3b90:0">.</span></span>

<span key="fd91c3e604f54d07bc3eda2c9b4846a8"><span offset-key="fd91c3e604f54d07bc3eda2c9b4846a8:0">Netlify validates that the certificate matches the custom domain for your site and that the DNS record for the domain is pointed at Netlify, then installs your certificate. If your certificate covers several of your sites (in other words, if itâ€™s a wildcard certificate or uses Subject Alternative Names), you can install it on one site, and it will apply to all other sites covered by the certificate.</span></span>

### 

<span key="3bc3ab940d0f4844a33950e4371a2e8c"><span offset-key="3bc3ab940d0f4844a33950e4371a2e8c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#certificates-with-dedicated-ips" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1c116d2a9add4e83ae10684a47913993" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="855d393e772c4f7ba4c4081f017389bc"><span data-offset-key="855d393e772c4f7ba4c4081f017389bc:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="312010439cfc4f6298fc3fc3f5b14b65"><span offset-key="312010439cfc4f6298fc3fc3f5b14b65:0">Certificates with dedicated IPs</span></span>

<span key="8f86268f4c0840f591f13b69ff19dace"><span offset-key="8f86268f4c0840f591f13b69ff19dace:0">Netlifyâ€™s standard HTTPS handling relies on a browser standard called </span></span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Server_Name_Indication" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ce852fb8a39c47aab919714f0c727308" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="b68feb4e43d6433f9357a17a2a31fe87"><span data-offset-key="b68feb4e43d6433f9357a17a2a31fe87:0">Server Name Indication</span></span></span></a><span key="061dd508036d455593fefb1d96b81283"><span offset-key="061dd508036d455593fefb1d96b81283:0">, or SNI. It makes provisioning and verifying certificates more efficient, but itâ€™s not supported on </span></span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Server_Name_Indication#Support" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="5af169c6288d429e819372f720655f6a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="12a6192eb777468da93a0d57385baf0a"><span data-offset-key="12a6192eb777468da93a0d57385baf0a:0">very old browsers</span></span></span></a><span key="db47f7f52d41496c851f3e3b97d10629"><span offset-key="db47f7f52d41496c851f3e3b97d10629:0">, like Internet Explorer 7 on Windows XP, or Android 4. Site visitors using these browsers will encounter a security message on your site before they can access it over HTTPS. You might also experience issues with certain automated tools, like PhantomJS below 2.0 (early 2015).</span></span>

<span key="38bce8a5080046ce86012a0740e6c7f3"><span offset-key="38bce8a5080046ce86012a0740e6c7f3:0">If you donâ€™t want to use an SNI-based certificate for your site, Netlify offers the option for a traditional certificate with a dedicated IP. Please </span></span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/support" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bc812bcc07024f64b658f2b066a62274" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="bb7b008c057943a1b020aae708411ae2"><span data-offset-key="bb7b008c057943a1b020aae708411ae2:0">contact us</span></span></span></a><span key="59979c518fc64e939b30faa81b7b1f9c"><span offset-key="59979c518fc64e939b30faa81b7b1f9c:0"> for more information. </span>*(This feature may not be available on all* </span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/pricing/#teams" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2f0fd138046f45e78559d81a5a641f40" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="ad95c4090fae44fca9f420dc56993859"><em>plans</em></span></span></a><span key="8976562d70cf4a8fb9c69cb8e4634f77">*.)*</span>

## 

<span key="35bcc9c965ee41d19aea9aa900cff9f5"><span offset-key="35bcc9c965ee41d19aea9aa900cff9f5:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#hsts-preload" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="43bc27d979b345e8b2337c1113621d40" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="b54b2c38edd64a0483cea7bcf87b17ed"><span data-offset-key="b54b2c38edd64a0483cea7bcf87b17ed:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="492df0fc2d394bee844d649a0c9733e3"><span offset-key="492df0fc2d394bee844d649a0c9733e3:0">HSTS preload</span></span>

<span key="01df9f6a2bb44be192d3b0f7645c556b"><span offset-key="01df9f6a2bb44be192d3b0f7645c556b:0">Most major browsers use a list of predefined domains to automatically connect to websites using HTTPS. This list is called the HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) preload list. Your site can be included in this list if you follow the requirements in </span></span><a href="https://hstspreload.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="24fad020c3f34022940d79ffea4e435a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="9bc495ec2609463494c2af6529dbe6e6"><span data-offset-key="9bc495ec2609463494c2af6529dbe6e6:0">hstspreload.org</span></span></span></a><span key="8095776d29b249aba8d8f805d69a7533"><span offset-key="8095776d29b249aba8d8f805d69a7533:0">:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="06db4805e5934874b5343e70fa1df328"><span offset-key="06db4805e5934874b5343e70fa1df328:0">Your custom domain must be accessible in the www subdomain. For example: </span>`www.petsofnetlify.com`<span offset-key="06db4805e5934874b5343e70fa1df328:2">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="78ebeef71b3d492992b2b111742164db"><span offset-key="78ebeef71b3d492992b2b111742164db:0">You must include this header in your </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/routing/headers/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4330e9dc5206429aaac4c37ddbba78fa" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="8019a5f170814ba28abea653042f4bd7"><code class="r-1vckr1u r-z2wwpe r-uibjmv r-m2pi6t r-1hvjb8t" data-slate-leaf="true" data-offset-key="8019a5f170814ba28abea653042f4bd7:0">_headers</code><span data-offset-key="8019a5f170814ba28abea653042f4bd7:1"> file</span></span></span></a><span key="9dc613bd02284efb8a065424cf94c017"><span offset-key="9dc613bd02284efb8a065424cf94c017:0"> or </span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/configure-builds/file-based-configuration/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e5e8379c388b4004980957ce1e1a2726" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="2aae603fece345e199be863c424e2d0c"><span data-offset-key="2aae603fece345e199be863c424e2d0c:0">Netlify configuration file</span></span></span></a><span key="841f0c949eb7430584d08acb2e859adb"><span offset-key="841f0c949eb7430584d08acb2e859adb:0">:</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

        <span key="90c778d5c5944f3698f76958a1cf8a97"><span offset-key="90c778d5c5944f3698f76958a1cf8a97:0">\_headers</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

        <span key="6162a078313f47e9bece55689bf387fa"><span offset-key="6162a078313f47e9bece55689bf387fa:0">netlify.toml</span></span>

    1

    <span key="a834b3715e434d3cbe005aa74aed68bf"><span offset-key="a834b3715e434d3cbe005aa74aed68bf:0">/\*</span></span>

    2

    <span key="dd8f2505c3464a0b989c52541e4cc590"><span offset-key="dd8f2505c3464a0b989c52541e4cc590:0"> Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload</span></span>

    <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7" />

    Copied!

<span key="46bfab477856435f815925fda81f80e1"><span offset-key="46bfab477856435f815925fda81f80e1:0">When this is set, the browser assumes that your site, along with all subdomains, can be accessed using HTTPS, and it will force those connections.</span></span>

<span key="83a84bf6e59f47feb431afb7fee3d058"><span offset-key="83a84bf6e59f47feb431afb7fee3d058:0">This action is not easily reversible</span></span>

<span key="d01d690d0b0a47319b6bdafdd2015417"><span offset-key="d01d690d0b0a47319b6bdafdd2015417:0">Please make sure to only use the directive </span>`preload`<span offset-key="d01d690d0b0a47319b6bdafdd2015417:2"> once youâ€™re confident that the domain </span>*and all subdomains*<span offset-key="d01d690d0b0a47319b6bdafdd2015417:4"> are ready to be served using </span>*only*<span offset-key="d01d690d0b0a47319b6bdafdd2015417:6"> HTTPS, since this setting is hard to remove once itâ€™s in place, </span></span><a href="https://hstspreload.org/#removal" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3f5c9bf6fd9c4da09c6280d904dc19fd" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="ba246228541d41789d8a145797ae0492"><span data-offset-key="ba246228541d41789d8a145797ae0492:0">as described at hstspreload.org</span></span></span></a><span key="49a817c5352c48adb885330cfbd4cbc1"><span offset-key="49a817c5352c48adb885330cfbd4cbc1:0">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="4864558392fc4d3f8bb257c82e703ae3"><span offset-key="4864558392fc4d3f8bb257c82e703ae3:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://docs.netlify.com/domains-https/https-ssl/#http-2" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ce78ed5efd7d4bfa85279b7b798a46aa" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-48899_259-48900-237__"><span data-key="d1ac47625a314b6e9b92c6868a513c88"><span data-offset-key="d1ac47625a314b6e9b92c6868a513c88:0">#</span></span></span></a><span key="7edc5c73af874c3e80e91a5084a2b1ff"><span offset-key="7edc5c73af874c3e80e91a5084a2b1ff:0">HTTP/2</span></span>

<span key="7511afc8b49b41d99080d3f7a36631a9"><span offset-key="7511afc8b49b41d99080d3f7a36631a9:0">When HTTPS is enabled for your site, Netlify supports HTTP/2, a newer internet protocol engineered for faster web performance. This brings support for core HTTP/2 features like request multiplexing and compressed headers, but does not include server push capability.</span></span>
